property.value: Cycling {2}{G}{G} ({2}{G}{G}, Discard this card: Draw a card.) When you cycle Gempalm Strider, Elf creatures get +2/+2 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Amplify 1 +lt;I+gt;(As this creature enters the battlefield, put a +1/+1 counter on it for each Beast card you reveal in your hand.)+lt;/I+gt;

property.value: Cycling {3} ({3}, Discard this card: Draw a card.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "New links are being added to the food chain on a daily basis." - Riptide Project researcher

property.name: Rules
property.value: At the beginning of your upkeep, sacrifice Krosan Cloudscraper unless you pay {G}{G}. Morph {7}{G}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Provoke (Whenever this creature attacks, you may have target creature defending player controls untap and block it if able.) Krosan Vorine can't be blocked by more than one creature.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Morph {1}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Nantuko Vigilante is turned face up, destroy target artifact or enchantment.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Reach (This creature can block creatures with flying.)

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The first aven scout squad returned from Krosa with disturbing stories. The second returned with disturbing casualties.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Morph {2}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Patron of the Wild is turned face up, target creature gets +3/+3 until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Primal Whisperer gets +2/+2 for each face-down creature on the battlefield. Morph {3}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.)

property.name: Rules
property.value: Flash Any player may cast Sliver spells as though they had flash.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The directors of the Riptide Project wanted instant results on the sliver experiments. They got their wish.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Sliver spells can't be countered.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "It would take another apocalypse to stop the slivers now." - Riptide Project researcher

property.name: Rules
property.value: Untap all permanents you control during each other player's untap step.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Her voice is wilderness, savage and pure." - Kamahl, druid acolyte

property.name: Rules
property.value: {7}{G}: Stonewood Invoker gets +5/+5 until end of turn.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: The Mirari pulses in his veins.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Target creature gets +X/+X until end of turn, where X is the number of Elves on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: Even through the Mirari's voice, the elves still hear the call of their kinship.

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever a Beast enters the battlefield, you may gain 3 life.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Elves and beasts are tied together, and I am the knot that binds them."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Morph {1}{G} (You may cast this card face down as a 2/2 creature for {3}. Turn it face up any time for its morph cost.) When Tribal Forcemage is turned face up, creatures of the creature type of your choice get +2/+2 and gain trample until end of turn.

property.name: Rules
property.value: This spell can't be countered. Vexing Beetle gets +3/+3 as long as no opponent controls a creature.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: As the Mirari's mutating effects grew out of control, centaurs and druids fled - but insects swarmed closer.

property.name: Rules
property.value: {T}: Add X mana of any one color, where X is the number of Elves on the battlefield.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Your words are meaningless. The rustling of leaves is the only language that makes any sense."

property.name: Rules
property.value: Whenever another nontoken Elf enters the battlefield, you may create a 1/1 green Insect creature token.

property.name: Flavor
property.value: "Most insects have been drawn to the Mirari. But all that remain in Wirewood are under my care."
